00020     Window::windowsCacheType Window::windowsCache;

00033     double Window::apply(WindowType type, unsigned int n, unsigned int N)
00034     {
00035         keyType key = std::make_pair(type, N);
00036 
00037         if (windowsCache.find(key) == windowsCache.end())
00038             createWindow(key);
00039 
00040         return windowsCache[key][n];
00041     }
00042 
00051     void Window::createWindow(const keyType& windowKey)
00052     {
00053         WindowType type = windowKey.first;
00054         unsigned int N = windowKey.second;
00055 
00056         if (type != WIN_RECT)
00057         {
00058             winType window;
00059             window.reserve(N);
00060             std::generate_n(std::back_inserter(window), N, WinGenerator(type, N));
00061             windowsCache[windowKey] = window;
00062         }
00063         else
00064         {
00065             winType window(N, 1.0);
00066             windowsCache[windowKey] = window;
00067         }
00068     }

00077     double Window::hamming(unsigned int n, unsigned int N)
00078     {
00079         return 0.53836 - 0.46164 * std::cos(2.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1));
00080     }
00081 
00089     double Window::hann(unsigned int n, unsigned int N)
00090     {
00091         return 0.5 * (1.0 - std::cos(2.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1)));
00092     }
00093 
00101     double Window::barlett(unsigned int n, unsigned int N)
00102     {
00103         return 1.0 - (2.0 * std::fabs(n - (N - 1) / 2.0)) / (double(N - 1));
00104     }
00105 
00113     double Window::blackman(unsigned int n, unsigned int N)
00114     {
00115         return 0.42 - 0.5 * std::cos(2.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1)) +
00116                 0.08 * std::cos(4.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1));
00117     }
00118 
00126     double Window::flattop(unsigned int n, unsigned int N)
00127     {
00128         return 1.0 - 1.93 * std::cos(2.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1)) +
00129                 1.29 * std::cos(4.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1)) -
00130                 0.388 * std::cos(6.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1)) +
00131                 0.0322 * std::cos(8.0 * M_PI * n / double(N - 1));
00132     }

00140     Window::WinGenerator::WinGenerator(WindowType type, unsigned int N):
00141         _N(N)
00142     {
00143         switch (type)
00144         {
00145         case WIN_HAMMING:
00146             windowMethod = &Window::hamming;
00147             break;
00148         case WIN_HANN:
00149             windowMethod = &Window::hann;
00150             break;
00151         case WIN_BARLETT:
00152             windowMethod = &Window::barlett;
00153             break;
00154         case WIN_BLACKMAN:
00155             windowMethod = &Window::blackman;
00156             break;
00157         case WIN_FLATTOP:
00158             windowMethod = &Window::flattop;
00159             break;
00160         default:
00161             windowMethod = &Window::hamming;
00162             break;
00163         }
00164     }
00165 
00173     double Window::WinGenerator::operator()() const
00174     {
00175         static unsigned int n = 0;
00176         return windowMethod(n++, _N);
00177     }
